options.name: collection
options.description: A collection of schematics to use in generating the initial application.

options.name: commit
options.description: Initial git repository commit information.

options.name: create-application
options.description: Create a new initial application project in the 'src' folder of the new workspace. When false, creates an empty workspace with no initial application. You can then use the generate application command so that all applications are created in the projects folder.

options.name: defaults
options.description: Disable interactive input prompts for options with a default.

options.name: directory
options.description: The directory name to create the workspace in.

options.name: dry-run
options.description: Run through and reports activity without writing out results.

options.name: force
options.description: Force overwriting of existing files.

options.name: help
options.description: Shows a help message for this command in the console.

options.name: inline-style
options.description: Include styles inline in the component TS file. By default, an external styles file is created and referenced in the component TypeScript file.

options.name: inline-template
options.description: Include template inline in the component TS file. By default, an external template file is created and referenced in the component TypeScript file.

options.name: interactive
options.description: Enable interactive input prompts.

options.name: minimal
options.description: Create a workspace without any testing frameworks. (Use for learning purposes only.)

options.name: name
options.description: The name of the new workspace and initial project.

options.name: new-project-root
options.description: The path where new projects will be created, relative to the new workspace root.

options.name: package-manager
options.description: The package manager used to install dependencies.

options.name: prefix
options.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors for the initial project.

options.name: routing
options.description: Generate a routing module for the initial project.

options.name: skip-git
options.description: Do not initialize a git repository.

options.name: skip-install
options.description: Do not install dependency packages.

options.name: skip-tests
options.description: Do not generate "spec.ts" test files for the new project.

options.name: strict
options.description: Creates a workspace with stricter type checking and stricter bundle budgets settings. This setting helps improve maintainability and catch bugs ahead of time. For more information, see https://angular.io/guide/strict-mode

options.name: style
options.description: The file extension or preprocessor to use for style files.

options.name: view-encapsulation
options.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the initial project.
